headline: Flexport head of trucking: New broker tech will be crucial in 5-10 years
summary: Bill Driegert, head of trucking at Flexport, spoke Wednesday at the F3: Future of Freight Festival in Chattanooga, Tennessee, about technology that is transforming the trucking industry. The post Flexport head of trucking: New broker tech will be crucial in 5-10 years appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Down -12.82% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why Uber (UBER) Looks Ripe for a Turnaround
summary: Uber (UBER) has become technically an oversold stock now, which implies exhaustion of the heavy selling pressure on it. This, combined with strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher, indicates a potential trend reversal for the stock in the near term.

raw.headline: Down -12.82% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why Uber (UBER) Looks Ripe for a Turnaround

headline: Uber, Lyft plan robotaxi fleet expansions
summary: With Tesla planning to produce robotaxis and compete with existing ride-hail companies as soon as 2025, Uber and Lyft are adding partnerships to enter new cities with driverless vehicles.

headline: Uber Said to Be in Talks to Invest in US IPO of China’s Pony AI
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Uber Technologies Inc. plans to invest in Pony AI Inc.’s US initial public offering, which is expected to be priced next week after being upsized by the autonomous driving firm, people familiar with the matter said.
